refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A Screen is a verbatim environment for displaying text that the user might see on a computer terminal. It is often used to display the results of a command.
Having less specific semantic overtones, Screen is often used wherever a verbatim presentation is desired, but the semantic of ProgramListing is inappropriate.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: Screens are usually displayed in a fixed width font.
